customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE MY BEAUTIFUL GLOVES!

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, looks like they’ll wear well
customer_reviews.text: They fit well with enough room for tall rings and long nails. I’m glad they are lined with Thinsulate as my cold tolerance isn’t what it used to be. The pair of gloves this purchase replaced were 15 years old. I expect to get the same wear quality from these based on first impressions of this pair.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China

I wouldn't be surprised to find out that I paid a 1,000% markup over cost on these gloves. I'll have to return these for another brand/pair that were made in the USA.
